events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a return and refund due to sizing issues with the purchased jacket.
Assigning this refund request to agent Emily for further assistance regarding the return process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 7834552, and the jacket is unused with all tags still attached in the original packaging.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid label we will email you shortly, and once we receive it, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great! I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions. I'll send the item back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything was handled to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us again if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey via email. We'd love to hear your feedback about your refund experience.
